oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reproduction of mucosal disease with cytopathogenic bovine viral diarrhoea virus selected in vitro
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Moennig, V.
Frey, H. -R.
Liebler, E.
Pohlenz, J.
Liess, B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bovine viral diarrhoea
BVD
non-cytopathogenic
persistently infected
antibodies
monoclonal
glycoprotein gp53
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Isolates of non-cytopathogenic bovine viral diarrhoea (BVD) virus from 18 persistently infected calves from one herd were compared by using monoclonal antibodies directed against the major viral glycoprotein gp53. Full article published in Veterinary Record (1990) 127, 200-203
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1990; 61
